name: BilateralMastectomy
title: Bilateral Mastectomy
description: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts that represent bilateral mastectomy procedures.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use the Quality Data Model (QDM) datatype related to Procedure, Performed.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with a bilateral mastectomy. This is a grouping of SNOMED CT codes.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes codes that indicate a unilateral mastectomy or are unspecified.)

concept.display: Resection of Bilateral Breast, Open Approach
Bilateral mastectomy with excision of bilateral regional lymph nodes (procedure)
Removal of intact mammary implant, bilateral, plus capsulectomies (procedure)
Bilateral subcutaneous mammectomy with synchronous implant (procedure)
